title: How to Lessen the Saltiness of Anchovies

steps.headline: Remove the amount of anchovies planned to be eaten or used to cook with.
Lay in a flat based bowl.
Pour milk over the anchovies.
steps.description: Let the anchovies sit for half an hour.

steps.headline: Drain the milk and remove the anchovies.
steps.description: The saltiness should be reduced considerably.

text: Remove the amount of anchovies planned to be eaten or used to cook with.  Lay in a flat based bowl.  Pour milk over the anchovies. Let the anchovies sit for half an hour. Drain the milk and remove the anchovies. The saltiness should be reduced considerably. Use as required.  Finished.
